message:
Hi Nathan,

I hope you are well.

Firstly, thank you for these fantastic tutorials.

A quick question - an enhancement request you might say - how would we include an exit option as part of the game?

Placing the button is ok, I am thinking more about the coding side of it, like would we use the same signal but how do we differentiate a start game to exit game in the code etc.?

Many Thanks,

Gary
